products.title: Lacoste croc logo oxford shirt in white
products.description:
Product Details

Oxford shirt by Lacoste
  • Smart thinking
  • Button-down collar
  • Chest pocket with signature logo
  • Button fastening
  • Regular fit
  • A standard cut for a classic shape

Brand

Famed for their iconic crocodile emblem, Lacoste was founded by tennis superstar René Lacoste in 1933 and was first to introduce the pique polo shirt. Utilising their sporting background, Lacoste fuse functionality with style to create their contemporary collections, embracing a bold use of colour in a wide range of products that include their timeless polo shirt as well as shoes and trainers.

SIZE & FIT


Model's height: 185.5cm/6'1"
Model is wearing: Size Medium

products.title: ASOS DESIGN regular fit patchwork check shirt
products.description:
Product Details

Shirt by ASOS DESIGN
  • Check design
  • It's hip to be square
  • Spread collar
  • Button placket
  • Two chest pockets
  • Long sleeves
  • Regular fit
  • No surprises, just a classic cut

Brand

Giving you the confidence to express your individuality, ASOS DESIGN takes major trends, adding the freshest ASOS spin. All the gear you need – including in our fit ranges Plus and Tall and our ASOS DESIGN Makeup collection – to create your coolest look, then switch it up again tomorrow. Make every day, night and everything in-between as extraordinary as you are.
